Package org.proto4j.graph

Class BracketUtil

java.lang.Object
org.proto4j.graph.BracketUtil
public final class BracketUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Small collection of methods to simplify the painting of lines in a JBracketView.
See Also:
JBracketView

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void paintLineAbove​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)
    Paints a line above next bracket.

    static void paintLineCentered​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • paintLineAbove

      public static void paintLineAbove​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)
      Paints a line above next bracket.

      The following view should illustrate how this utility method will paint the bracket line: 

       +-----------+
 | Bracket 1 +------------+
 +-----------+            |
                    +-----+-----+
                    | Bracket 3 |
                    +-----+-----+
 +-----------+            |
 | Bracket 2 +------------+
 +-----------+
      There will be always two lines painted either above or below the bracket in the next column. The first line starts at the following point: 
           x := bracket1.x + view.bracketWidth
     y := bracket1.y + (view.bracketHeight / 2)
      Parameters:
      view - the bracket view component
      gs - the graphics context to paint in
      column - the current column
      row - the current row

    • paintLineBelow

      public static void paintLineBelow​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)
      Paints a centered line to the next bracket (below the current).

      The following view should illustrate how this utility method will paint the bracket line: 

       +-----------+
 | Bracket 1 |
 +-----+-----+
       |            +-----------+
       +------------+ Bracket 3 |
       |            +-----------+
 +-----+-----+
 | Bracket 2 |
 +-----------+
      Note that only brackets with even row indices will be used to paint these lines.
      Parameters:
      view - the bracket view component
      gs - the graphics context to paint in
      column - the current column
      row - the current row

    • paintLineCentered

      public static void paintLineCentered​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)
      Paints a centered line to the next bracket.

      The following view should illustrate how this utility method will paint the bracket line: 

       +-----------+
 | Bracket 1 +--+
 +-----------+  |
                |   +-----------+
                +---+ Bracket 3 |
                |   +-----------+
 +-----------+  |
 | Bracket 2 +--+
 +-----------+
      Parameters:
      view - the bracket view component
      gs - the graphics context to paint in
      column - the current column
      row - the current row
